# UICellConfigurationState.DragState.dragging

**Case**

The cell is part of an active drag session.

## Declaration

```swift
case dragging
```

## Drag states

- **UICellConfigurationState.DragState.none**: The system hasn’t associated the cell with a drag session.
- **UICellConfigurationState.DragState.lifting**: A user interaction is lifting the cell, but it isn’t yet part of an active drag session.
